# About Taypro
Taypro develops and manufactures autonomous solar panel cleaning robots that help solar farms maintain optimal efficiency. 
The company offers waterless cleaning solutions, dual-pass cleaning technology, and AI-powered scheduling systems.
Taypro has won patents for their revolutionary solar panel cleaning system.

# API Endpoints

## Public APIs

### Blog APIs
GET /api/blog/list
- Returns: List of all blog posts (from both file system and database)
- Response: { blogs: Array<{title, description, featuredImage, author, slug, publishDate, href, source}> }
- Content-Type: application/json

GET /api/blog/slug/[slug]
- Returns: Single blog post by slug
- Response: Blog post data with content

POST /api/blog/create
- Creates a new blog post in the database
- Body: { title, description, featuredImage, author, content }
- Requires: All fields except author (defaults to "Taypro Team")
- Response: { success: boolean, id, slug, url }

### Other APIs
GET /api/blog/scrape
- Scrapes blog content from external URLs (WordPress sites)
- Query params: url (required)

## Admin APIs (Require Authentication)

POST /api/admin/auth/login
- Authenticates admin user
- Body: { password }
- Response: { success: boolean }

GET /api/admin/blog/list
- Returns: List of all blog posts from file system
- Requires: Authentication cookie

POST /api/admin/blog/create
- Creates a new blog post as file
- Body: { title, description, featuredImage, author, content, publishDate }
- Requires: Authentication

GET /api/admin/blog/[slug]
- Gets blog post metadata by slug
- Requires: Authentication

PUT /api/admin/blog/[slug]
- Updates blog post by slug
- Requires: Authentication

DELETE /api/admin/blog/[slug]
- Deletes blog post by slug
- Requires: Authentication

GET /api/admin/upload/list
- Lists uploaded images from public/uploads directory
- Requires: Authentication

POST /api/admin/upload
- Uploads images to public/uploads directory
- Body: FormData with image file
- Requires: Authentication

# Content Structure

## Blog Posts
Blog posts are stored in two ways:
1. File-based: Located in src/app/blog/[slug]/ with metadata.json and page.tsx
2. Database: Stored in backend database, accessible via API

Each blog post contains:
- title: Blog post title
- description: Meta description
- featuredImage: URL to featured image
- author: Author name (default: "Taypro Team")
- slug: URL-friendly identifier
- publishDate: ISO date string
- content: HTML content of the blog post

## Images
Public images are stored in:
- /public/blogs/ - Blog post images
- /public/tayproasset/ - Company assets and logos
- /public/tayprorobots/ - Robot product images
- /public/tayprosolarfirm/ - Solar farm project images
- /public/tayprokeymetrics/ - Project metrics images
- /public/uploads/ - User uploaded images (requires auth)

## External Image Sources
The site also uses images from:
- https://taypro.in/wp-content/uploads/ - WordPress site images
- https://res.cloudinary.com - Cloudinary CDN
- https://images.unsplash.com - Unsplash images

# Data Sources

## Backend API
- Base URL: https://console.taypro.in (configurable via NEXT_PUBLIC_BACKEND_URL)
- Blog Posts: GET /api/v1/blogposts
- Blog by Slug: GET /api/v1/blogposts/slug/[slug]
- Blog by ID: GET /api/v1/blogposts/id/[id]
- Create Blog: POST /api/v1/blogposts

## Content Format
- Blog content is stored as HTML
- Images in blog content use standard <img> tags
- Featured images use Next.js Image component with optimization
